project_name.justification: The acquisition is described as an expansion of Athena's main project: "This acquisition expands our flagship Excelsior Springs Project located in the Walker Lane Trend, Nevada."

company_name.justification: The acquiring company is identified at the beginning of the press release: "Athena Gold Corporation (OTCQB:AHNR)(CSE:ATHA) ("Athena" or the "Company") is pleased to announce that it has entered into an asset purchase and sale agreement..."

ceo_buyer.justification: The CEO and President of the buyer, Athena Gold Corporation, is listed at the end of the press release: "On Behalf of the Board of Directors John C. Power Chief Executive Officer and President"

interest_acquired_percent.justification: The agreement is for a full interest in the acquired claims: "...to acquire an 100% interest in 11 unpatented BLM claims covering approximately 89 hectares (220 acres) known as the Blue Dick Mine..."

primary_commodity.justification: The text describes the flagship project's primary commodity: "About Our Flagship Excelsior Springs Project... Gold mineralization discovered at the Project to date occurs in quartz veins, stock-works, and silicified zones..."

verified_article_link.justification: The article's title and content directly relate to the Excelsior Springs project, detailing an acquisition to expand it: "Athena Gold Corporation Signs Agreement to Acquire Historic Blue Dick Mine and Significantly Expands Its Flagship Excelsior Springs Gold Project in Nevada".

currency.justification: The currency for the cash consideration is explicitly stated as US dollars: "Total consideration consists of an aggregate of US $45,000 in cash and a 3% NSR."

cash_payments_raw.justification: The total cash consideration is stated in both articles. The first article breaks it down into three payments (US $10,000, US $15,000, and US $20,000) and also provides the total: "Total consideration consists of an aggregate of US $45,000 in cash and a 3% NSR."

share_payments_raw.justification: The transaction details only mention cash payments and an NSR; there is no mention of share payments.

cash_and_share_payments_combined_raw.justification: The cash payment is explicitly detailed, so this combined field is not applicable.

amount_of_shares_issued.justification: The transaction details do not mention any issuance of shares as part of the consideration.

share_warrant_payments_raw.justification: The transaction details do not mention any share warrants as part of the consideration.

option_payments_raw.justification: The transaction details do not mention any options as part of the consideration.

issued_share_price.justification: No shares were issued as part of the transaction, so there is no issued share price.

exploration_commitment_meters.justification: The press release does not mention any exploration commitment in terms of drilling meters.

exploration_commitment_value_raw.justification: The press release does not mention any monetary exploration commitment as part of the acquisition agreement.

nsr_acquired_percent.justification: As part of the transaction, a Net Smelter Royalty was granted to the seller: "...the grant of a 3% net smelter return royalty to Silver Reserve, of which 2% may be purchased by the Company subject to certain buy-back options."

coverage_area_raw.justification: The area of the acquired claims is specified in the agreement details: "...acquire an 100% interest in 11 unpatented BLM claims covering approximately 89 hectares (220 acres) known as the Blue Dick Mine..."

coverage_area_unit.justification: The unit for the acquired area is specified as hectares: "...covering approximately 89 hectares (220 acres)..."

resource_size.justification: The text mentions "unverified, historical production of 19,200 troy ounces" but does not provide a current, quantified mineral resource estimate. A disclaimer notes that "a qualified person has not done sufficient work to verify the results" of historical data.

buyer_ticker_and_exchange.justification: The buyer's ticker and exchange are provided in the company's introduction: "Athena Gold Corporation (OTCQB:AHNR)(CSE:ATHA)"
